about.para1: Dukora is a modern, open-source inventory and business management system designed to provide a comprehensive, real-time overview of your operations. Built with a powerful and scalable tech stack, it offers everything from product and warehouse management to detailed financial analytics and role-based user permissions.
about.para2: Born in Kigali in 2024, our mission is to bring total financial clarity to businesses of all sizes. We combine deep technical expertise with user-centric design to create tools that empower teams to make better decisions faster.
about.para3: Built with small to medium businesses in mind, Dukora scales alongside your growth, ensuring you always have the insights and control you need to succeed in a competitive market.
about.title: Built for businesses that need clarity and control
